div.p: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

In ten years, I'll be anywhere else in the world but in Belgium. I'd like to discover many other countries which is very different from Europe, discover the way they're living and discover many different landscape. I'll travel with my boyfriend and maybye my children but ten years is'nt so far so I don't think so, but.. Why not?
